ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: J. Smythe To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday, April 12, 2002 12:48 AM Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi all Im not even going to bother with
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: J. Smythe
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 12, 2002 12:48 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi all


Im not even going to bother with 1hb. Just 1hs, 2hs, piercing, 2hb, I still
recommend the shovel method though if you are a relatively low level
character and don't mind looking like a fool.
====================

Whats wrong with 1hb?

My current 1hb is the No Drop Sambata War Staff... 8/18.

Pity if you kill the mob that drops it but you never bothered to even stick
a mace in your off-hand so have a skill of 1. Especially as this staff is
Primary hand only, so using it to skill up will really affect your fighting
if you had no 1hb skill to start with...

Matt
